name: JeweLevel
description:
Welcome to JeweLevel!

Take a cosmic trip by completing Match 3 levels to travel from planet to planet. Who isn't familiar with Match 3 games, then in these you have a board of gems or other things and you have to swap 2 adjacent ones to make a line of at least 3 same things.

In JeweLevel, you have a lot of different ways to play. This game has

· an adventure level pack with 150 levels.

· 8 different game modes.

· free-play versions of 3 most basic modes.

· Level Customizer, that lets you create your OWN Match-3 levels.

· And of course, making a line of more than 3 gems of the same colour awards you with a powerup.

So come on, the spaceship is waiting!

Enjoy!
